Author: Fr4nsson
Name: OopsNoLalafells
Description:
Turn all Lalafells around you into other races. Also allows you to change your own race.

Use /nolala to open settings.

Original code (OopsAllLalafells) by Avaflow
https://ava.dev/ava/OopsAllLalafells
Punchline: That one essential plugin no one told you about but should have.
